original_text: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:
korean_text: 베냐민 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 벨라에게서 난 벨라 종족과 아스벨에게서 난 아스벨 종족과 아히람에게서 난 아히람 종족과

sentences.original_text: The sons of Benjamin after their families:
sentences.korean_translation: 베냐민의 아들들은 그 가족대로 다음과 같다:

sentences.original_text: of Bela, the family of the Belaites:
of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites:
of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:
